Key Match Events: Jack Grealish scored the opening goal for England
Trent Alexander-Arnold scored a stunning free-kick to double England's lead
Declan Rice added a third goal for England on the counter-attack
Post-Match Reflections: Lee Carsley expressed his relief at getting things back on track
Jack Grealish praised Trent Alexander-Arnold's free-kick and expressed his happiness with the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in Helsinki
Others: England returned to winning ways after a disappointing defeat to Greece in their previous match
